name: abap2ui5
description: Developing UI5 Apps purely in ABAP.

scripts.clone1: rm -rf abap2UI5 && git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/abap2UI5/abap2UI5 && cp -r abap2UI5/src src
scripts.clone2: rm -rf abap2UI5-samples && git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/abap2UI5/abap2UI5-samples && cp -r abap2UI5-samples/src src/samples
scripts.clone: rm -rf src && npm run clone1 && npm run clone2
scripts.init_abap2ui5: rm -rf src && rm -rf abap2UI5 &&  mkdir src && git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/abap2UI5/abap2UI5.git && cp -r abap2UI5/src/* src/
scripts.init_samples: rm -rf abap2UI5-samples && git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/abap2UI5/abap2UI5-samples && cp -r abap2UI5-samples/src src/samples
scripts.init: npm run init_abap2ui5 && npm run init_samples
scripts.syfixes: find . -type f -name '*.abap' -exec sed -i -e 's/ RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE cx_sy_itab_line_not_found/ ASSERT 1 = 0/g' {} +
scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && cp -r src downport && abaplint --fix ./ci/abaplint-downport.jsonc && npm run syfixes
scripts.downport_samples: rm -rf downport && cp -r src downport && abaplint --fix ./ci/abaplint-downport-samples.jsonc && npm run syfixes
scripts.transpile: rm -rf output && cp srv/*.abap downport && abap_transpile ./ci/abap_transpile.json
scripts.test: npm run downport && npm run transpile && npm run unit
scripts.build: npm ci && npm run downport && npm run transpile && rm -rf src
scripts.init_play: git clone https://github.com/abap2UI5/abap2UI5-transpiled && cd abap2UI5-transpiled && npm run init && npm run build && cd ..
